item.title: A Kabylie wedding: stories of volunteering abroad!
item.author: Marco Rodrigues,
item.description: I found myself in the in the middle of an AIESEC reunion, right in the heart of Alger, when this tall Algerian man approaches me in Portuguese. I was not expecting that at all, as the spoken language at this meeting was either English, French or Arabic. A week had passed since I left Portugal to do â€¦
